description: Period in human prehistory marked by the use of stone tools
label: Stone Age

description: Period in human history characterized by the use of bronze tools
label: Bronze Age

description: Period in human history marked by the widespread use of iron
label: Iron Age

description: Old Kingdom Period of Egypt, the civilization along the Nile River
label: Egypt

description: Boat built by Noah to save life from a flood
label: Noah's Ark

description: Tower built in an attempt to reach heaven, leading to the confusion of languages
label: Tower of Babel
